title: De Stijl but not De Stijl
content:
Looks like De Stijl, not quite the same though. - see 'B'

Previous threads on the subject:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/18796](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124657/http:/typophile.com/node/18796 "http://typophile.com/node/18796")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/18503](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124657/http:/typophile.com/node/18503 "http://typophile.com/node/18503")

Any help appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Type%20ID%204b_5411.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Type%20ID%204a_5030.jpg)
author: RBM

comments.content: [Stenberg ITC/Rodchenko PT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124657/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/stenberg) should do the job (note /Y in "WA **Y** BACK" is probably /4).
